title: Pixel 3a fingerprint sensor is totally unresponsive
content:
Trying to scan fingerprint for unlocking. 
It WAS working, then became intermittent, then said sensor was dirty.  
I deleted 3 previous fingerprint imprints, and it stopped working entirely. 
When I try to setup a new imprint, it doesn't register at all, in the past it used to tell my to move my finger around but now it just sits there.

I tried:  (after cleaning my own fingers :)
- cleaning with old non-moistened T-Shirt - no good.  
- cleaning with dry paper towel - no good. 
- cleaning with moist (not even damp) cotton swab - still no good.
- restart in Safe Mode - no difference.

I wanted to know if there's anything else I might try before doing a factory reset.
Is there an app that might test the sensor or something?

Thanks
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
